languages.text: "Джи... Джиневри ее звали..." {n}Несостоявшийся еретик поднимает руки к лицу, и вы видите фиолетовые синяки. Они старше других, им уже несколько часов. Его били долго, старательно. Он громко кричал... Кто-нибудь обязательно это видел.{/n}

"Ji... Jinevri. Her name was Jinevri..." {n}The failed heretic raises his hands to his face, and you see many purple bruises. They are older than the others by several hours. He was evidently beaten long and hard, and he would have been screaming the whole time. Someone must have witnessed it.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Джи... Джиневри ее звали..." {n}Несостоявшийся еретик поднимает руки к лицу, и вы видите фиолетовые синяки. Они старше других, им уже несколько часов. Его били долго, старательно. Он громко кричал... Кто-нибудь обязательно это видел.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ji... Jinevra, her name was Jinevra..." {n}The failed heretic raises his hands to his face, and you see purple bruises. They are older than the others, several hours old. He had been beaten long and hard. He was screaming loudly. Someone must have witnessed it.{/n}

"Ji... Jinevra, her name was Jinevra..." {n}The failed heretic raises his hands to his face, and you see purple bruises. They are older than the others, several hours old. He had been beaten long and hard. He was screaming loudly. Someone must have witnessed it.{/n}

"Ji... Jinevra. Her name was Jinevra..." {n}The failed heretic raises his hands to his face, and you see many purple bruises. They are older than the others by several hours. He was evidently beaten long and hard, and he would have been screaming the whole time. Someone must have witnessed it.{/n}

"Ji... Jinevra. Her name was Jinevra..." {n}The failed heretic raises his hands to his face, and you see many purple bruises. They are older than the others by several hours. He was evidently beaten long and hard, and he would have been screaming the whole time. Someone must have witnessed it.{/n}

"Ji... Jinevri. Her name was Jinevri..." {n}The failed heretic raises his hands to his face, and you see many purple bruises. They are older than the others by several hours. He was evidently beaten long and hard, and he would have been screaming the whole time. Someone must have witnessed it.{/n}

"Ji... Jinevri. Her name was Jinevri..." {n}The failed heretic raises his hands to his face, and you see many purple bruises. They are older than the others by several hours. He was evidently beaten long and hard, and he would have been screaming the whole time. Someone must have witnessed it.{/n}

languages.text: "Ji... Jinevri. Ihr Name war Jinevri ..." {n}Als sich der gescheiterte Ketzer die Hände vor das Gesicht hält, siehst du zahlreiche Hämatome. Sie sind mehrere Stunden älter als die anderen. Er wurde offenbar lange und hart geschlagen. Gewiss hat er dabei die ganze Zeit geschrien. Das muss doch jemand gesehen haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ji... Jinevri. Her name was Jinevri..." {n}The failed heretic raises his hands to his face, and you see many purple bruises. They are older than the others by several hours. He was evidently beaten long and hard, and he would have been screaming the whole time. Someone must have witnessed it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ji... Jinevri. Ihr Name war Jinevri ..." {n}Als sich der gescheiterte Ketzer die Hände vor das Gesicht hält, siehst du zahlreiche Hämatome. Sie sind mehrere Stunden älter als die anderen. Er wurde offenbar lange und hart geschlagen. Gewiss hat er dabei die ganze Zeit geschrien. Das muss doch jemand gesehen haben.{/n}

languages.text: « Ji... Jinevri. Elle s'appelait Jinevri... » {n}L'hérétique lève les mains vers son visage, et vous remarquez qu'elles sont couvertes d'ecchymoses violettes qui semblent plus anciennes que les autres de plusieurs heures. Il a manifestement été battu longtemps et sans retenue, au point qu'il vous paraît impossible qu'il ait pu retenir ses cris. Quelqu'un l'a forcément entendu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ji... Jinevri. Her name was Jinevri..." {n}The failed heretic raises his hands to his face, and you see many purple bruises. They are older than the others by several hours. He was evidently beaten long and hard, and he would have been screaming the whole time. Someone must have witnessed it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ji... Jinevri. Elle s'appelait Jinevri... » {n}L'hérétique lève les mains vers son visage, et vous remarquez qu'elles sont couvertes d'ecchymoses violettes qui semblent plus anciennes que les autres de plusieurs heures. Il a manifestement été battu longtemps et sans retenue, au point qu'il vous paraît impossible qu'il ait pu retenir ses cris. Quelqu'un l'a forcément entendu.{/n}

languages.text: «Ji... Jinevri. Se llamaba Jinevri...». {n}El hereje fracasado se lleva las manos a la cara y notas numerosos hematomas morados. Son varias horas más antiguos que los otros. Evidentemente, ha recibido una paliza larga y dolorosa, durante la cual ha debido de gritar constantemente. Por fuerza, habrá algún testigo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ji... Jinevri. Her name was Jinevri..." {n}The failed heretic raises his hands to his face, and you see many purple bruises. They are older than the others by several hours. He was evidently beaten long and hard, and he would have been screaming the whole time. Someone must have witnessed it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ji... Jinevri. Se llamaba Jinevri...». {n}El hereje fracasado se lleva las manos a la cara y notas numerosos hematomas morados. Son varias horas más antiguos que los otros. Evidentemente, ha recibido una paliza larga y dolorosa, durante la cual ha debido de gritar constantemente. Por fuerza, habrá algún testigo.{/n}

languages.text: 「ジ…ジネヴリだ。女の名前はジネヴリだった…」{n}落ちぶれた異端者が顔へと手を持ち上げる。いくつもの紫色のあざが見えた。そのあざは、他のものより数時間ほど古いものだ。彼が長時間、激しい暴行を受けていたことは明らかで、その間叫び続けていたことだろう。目撃した者がいるのは確かだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ji... Jinevri. Her name was Jinevri..." {n}The failed heretic raises his hands to his face, and you see many purple bruises. They are older than the others by several hours. He was evidently beaten long and hard, and he would have been screaming the whole time. Someone must have witnessed it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ジ…ジネヴリだ。女の名前はジネヴリだった…」{n}落ちぶれた異端者が顔へと手を持ち上げる。いくつもの紫色のあざが見えた。そのあざは、他のものより数時間ほど古いものだ。彼が長時間、激しい暴行を受けていたことは明らかで、その間叫び続けていたことだろう。目撃した者がいるのは確かだ。{/n}

languages.text: “杰……杰尼娃……她的名字叫杰尼娃……”{n}这个失败的异端分子用手遮住了脸，你看到他的手上到处都是紫色的伤痕，这些伤痕是最近几个小时留下来的。很显然，他被打了很长时间，应该是从头到尾都在尖叫。肯定有人目击了他挨打的情形。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ji... Jinevri. Her name was Jinevri..." {n}The failed heretic raises his hands to his face, and you see many purple bruises. They are older than the others by several hours. He was evidently beaten long and hard, and he would have been screaming the whole time. Someone must have witnessed it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “杰……杰尼娃……她的名字叫杰尼娃……”{n}这个失败的异端分子用手遮住了脸，你看到他的手上到处都是紫色的伤痕，这些伤痕是最近几个小时留下来的。很显然，他被打了很长时间，应该是从头到尾都在尖叫。肯定有人目击了他挨打的情形。{/n}

languages.text: "Ji... Jinevri. Adı Jinevri'ydi..." {n}Beceriksiz kâfir, ellerini yüzüne götürüyor. Pek çok morluk görüyorsun. Diğerlerinden saatler önce oluştukları ortada. Anlaşılan ağır bir şekilde uzun uzadıya dövülmüş ve tüm bu süre boyunca feryat etmiş. Buna birilerinin şahit olmuş olması gerek.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ji... Jinevri. Her name was Jinevri..." {n}The failed heretic raises his hands to his face, and you see many purple bruises. They are older than the others by several hours. He was evidently beaten long and hard, and he would have been screaming the whole time. Someone must have witnessed it.{/n}
